src_text: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.
ref_text: Nekazarien eta haien familien beharrei erantzuteko bezainbeste elikagai ekoizteko egiten den nekazaritzari iraupen-nekazaritza deritzo.
hyp_text: Landaberritze-lana da, lurra lantzen den arazketa da, baina ez da askatasuneko lantzen.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.
[Basque]:

src_text: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
ref_text: Iraupen-nekazaritza sistema sinplea da, maiz organikoa, eta ekoeskualdekoak diren gordetako haziak eta laboreen errotazioa edo antzeko teknika sinpleak erabiltzen ditu ahalik eta uzta handiena lortzeko.
hyp_text: Ekoerregioko espezieak dituzten lurrak, landareak salbatzen dituzten eta lurraren produktibitatea handitzeko erabiltzen diren teknika berriztagarriak (adibidez, lurraren ziklikoa) erabiltzen dituzten landare-ekarpena da.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
[Basque]:

src_text: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
ref_text: Historikoki, baserritar gehienek iraupen-nekazaritza egiten zuten, eta hala gertatzen da oraindik ere garatze bidean dauden herrialde askotan.
hyp_text: Historikoki gehienek, nekazariek baliabideen utzita bizi dira, eta hori oraindik askotan garapen maila baxuko herrialdeetan gertatzen da.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
[Basque]:

src_text: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members.
ref_text: Azpikulturak bereizteko modu asko daude, hala nola adina, etnizitatea, klasea, kokapena edo generoa.
hyp_text: Subkulturak kideen adina, etnia, klasea, kokapena eta/edo generoa dela eta bereizgarria izan daiteke.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members.
[Basque]:

src_text: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.
ref_text: Azpikultura bat zehazten duten ezaugarriak linguistikoak, estetikoak, erlijiozkoak, politikoak, sexualak, geografikoak edo faktoreen konbinazio bat izan daitezke.
hyp_text: Hizkuntza, estetika, erlijioa, politika, sexualitatea, geografia, edo faktore batzuk biltzen dituen faktoreak subkultura batek berezitasuna duenaren baldintzatzen dituzte.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.
[Basque]:

src_text: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
ref_text: Azpikultura bateko kideek haien kidetza erakusteko estiloaren erabilera bereizgarri eta sinbolikoa egiten dute, eta hor sartzen dira modak, berezitasunak eta argota.
hyp_text: Subkulturaren kideek, ohitura, modan eta argotaren bidez kideen kideotasuna adierazten dute, ohiturak, modak eta argotak.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
[Basque]:

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
ref_text: Sozializazioaren garrantzia erakusteko erabiltzen den metodo ohikoenetako bat da hazten ari zirela, utzikeria, zorigaitzak edo berariazko abusuak tarteko, helduekin sozializatzeko aukerarik izan ez zuten haurren kasu zorigaiztokoak.
hyp_text: Bat ere ohiko modu bat erabil daiteke gizarte-entzuketzearen garrantzia ilustratzeko, haurrak haurtzaroan, ohikoaren aurkako abantaila, deserosotasuna edo buruzagi abusua dela eta, gizarte-adultuak ezentzuketzea.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
[Basque]:

src_text: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
ref_text: Haur horiei “basati” esaten zaie. Haur basati batzuk pertsonek giltzapetu zituzten (normalean beren gurasoek), beste batzuetan haurrak alde batera uzten zituzten gurasoek, ez zituztelako onartzen haur baten desgaitasun intelektual edo fisiko larriak.
hyp_text: Haur hauek "feral" edo basatiak deitu izan dira. Feral haur batzuk dira bere buruaren jatorrizko gurasoak konfinatu dituztenak; kasu batzuetan, haur horren espetxean uztea gurasoen aldeko haur baten intelektual edo fisikoki arinak direla erabaki zuten.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
[Basque]:

src_text: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.
ref_text: Litekeena da haur basatiek haurtzaroan abusu edo trauma larriak bizi izana bakarrik utzi edo ihes egin aurretik.
hyp_text: Haur gurutzatuak izan daitezke elikadura gehiegi edo trauma gogor bat jasan duteneak abandonatu edo ihes egiteko.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.
[Basque]:

src_text: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
ref_text: Beste batzuk, ustez, animaliek hazi dituzte; esaten dutenez, beste batzuk beren kabuz bizi izan dira naturan.
hyp_text: Beste batzuk animaliengandik igoak direla esan ohi da; batzuk bakarrik bizitzeko eta mendiko bizilekuan bizi direla dio.

[English]: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.

src_text: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
ref_text: Gizakiak ez diren animaliek hazitako haur basatien kasuan, zaintza-animalia jakin horren ia guztiz berdinak diren portaerak izan ohi dituzte (muga fisikoen barruan), hala nola gizakiekiko beldurra edo interes falta.
hyp_text: Animalia batzuenetan osoa haziak, animalia horren erakundean (gizakiak baino gutxiago) jokabideak erakusten ditu, hala nola gizakiak beldurra edo hutsa erakusten duena.

src_text: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
ref_text: Proiektuetan oinarritutako ikasketak ikasteko prozesua errazagoa eta interesgarriagoa bihurtzen badu ere, aldamio-metodoak beste urrats bat egiten du aurrera.
hyp_text: Proiektu-lanetan oinarritutako ikasketak ikaskuntza errazagoa eta interesa handiagoa izatea helburu duen arren, eskailera-motako ikaskuntzak hori gainditzen du.

Translate the following sentence from English to Basque

src_text: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
ref_text: Aldamio-metodoa ez da ikasteko metodo bat, baizik eta ikasketa-esperientzia berri baten murgilduta daudenei laguntzeko modu bat, adibidez, ordenagailu-programa berri bat erabiltzean edo proiektu berri bat hastean beharrezkoa dena.
hyp_text: Skafoildadura ez da ikasteko bide bat baizik eta gizaki bati laguntzeko bide bat, bereziki bai, berak ikasten ari dena berak ikasteko aukera izan ezik, adibidez, programarik berri bat erabiltzen hasi aurretik edo proiektu berri bat hasi aurretik.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
[Basque]:

src_text: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
ref_text: Aldamioak birtualak edo benetakoak izan daitezke; bestela esanda, irakasle bat aldamio mota bat da, baita Microsoft Office-ko klip-gizontxoa ere.
hyp_text: Zuretzat ez dirudi baina ereduak bide erreal eta virtualak ditu, hau da, irakaslea eredu bat da, baina Microsoft Office-ko paperclip txikia ere.

src_text: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.

src_text: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.

hyp_text: XX. mendearen hasiera baino lehen, hainbat biologo genetikotan zabaldu ziren bi geneen multzoak: ezkutuak eta adierazitakoak.

Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
[Basque]:

src_text: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation.
ref_text: Mutazioek aldaera genetiko berriak gehitzen dituzte, eta hautaketak, berriz, kendu egiten ditu adierazitako aldaeren multzotik.
hyp_text: Mutazio berriko genetikako aldatzea, eta selekzioa hortik ateratzen du adierazitako aldaketa.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation.
[Basque]:

src_text: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.

hyp_text: Banaketa eta berregituratzea aldatzen da erabiltzen den bi aldeko bikotearen artean.

[English]: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.
[Basque]:

src_text: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
ref_text: Sabanan, gizakien antzeko digestio-sistema duen primate batentzat zaila da eskura dituen landare-baliabideetatik beharrezkoak dituen aminoazidoak lortzea.

[Basque]:

src_text: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.

hyp_text: Horrez gain, ez duenak ondorio larriak ditu: beheraketa ekonomiko, desnutrizioa eta azkenik heriotza.

Translate the following sentence from English to Basque

src_text: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.
ref_text: Hostoetan eta lekaleetan dauden proteinak izango lirateke eskuragarrien dituzten landare-baliabideak, baina gu bezalako primateentzat digeritzeko zailak dira prestatu gabe daudenean.
hyp_text: Landareak erabilgarrienak, proteinak, hostoak eta leguminoak izango ziren, baina hauek digestio egokia izateko katuak bezala prestatu behar gara.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Basque
[English]: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.
[Basque]:

src_text: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.
ref_text: Aldiz, animalia-elikagaiek (inurriak, termitak, arrautzak), digeritzeko errazak izateaz gain, oinarrizko aminoazido guztiak dituzten kalitate handiko proteinak dituzte.
hyp_text: Bestelakoetan, animalia elikagaiak (armiarma, termiteak, arrautzak) ez dira bakarrik digestiboki hondatzen, baizik eta proteinazko kontzentrazio handia ematen dute, aminoazido esentzial guztiak dituztenak.

Translate the following sentence from English to Basque

[Basque]:

src_text: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.

src_text: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).
ref_text: Loaren etenaldiaren prozesuan, loaldi arruntean berariaz esnatu eta handik gutxira loak hartzen zaitu berriro (10-60 minutu).

[English]: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).
[Basque]:

src_text: This can be easily done by using a relatively quiet alarm clock to bring you to consciousness without fully waking you.

src_text: The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side.
ref_text: Azalak 70 km inguruko zabalera du aurreko aldean eta 100 km inguruko zabalera ezkutuko aldean.

src_text: It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands.
ref_text: Ilargi-itsasoen azpian finagoa da, eta lodiagoa lur garaietan.

src_text: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.
ref_text: Baliteke ilargi-itsaso gehiago egotea aurreko aldean, azala finagoa delako. Errazagoa zen laba gainazalera ateratzea.
hyp_text: Maria gehiago izan daitezke alde hurbilean, krustoa gehiago dagoenez. Lava eraginkorrago igo daitekeen, zabaldu zen.

src_text: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.
ref_text: Edukien teorien xedea da pertsonak zerk markatzen dituen edo zerk erakartzen dituen jakitea.

src_text: These theories suggest that people have certain needs and/or desires which have been internalized as they mature to adulthood.
ref_text: Teoria horiek iradokitzen dute jendeak behar eta/edo nahi jakin batzuk dituela eta helduarora iritsi ahala barneratu egiten dituztela.
hyp_text: Hauek proposatu dute teoria bat, hau da, gizakiek beharrak eta/edo nahiak dituztela, eta gizakiok heldu aurretik, bereganatu ditugu.

src_text: These theories look at what it is about certain people that make them want the things that they do and what things in their environment will make them do or not do certain things.
ref_text: Teoria horiek bi ideiatan jartzen dute arreta: jendeak zergatik nahi dituen gauzak eta haien ingurunean dauden zer gauzek bultzatuko dituzten gauza jakinak egitera edo ez egitera.
hyp_text: Teoriei hauetan nola pentsatzen duen jakin nahi duten gizonak eta emakumeak eta nola eragiten duen inguruko gauzak jakin nahi duten gauzak egiteko edo ez egiteko.

[Basque]:

src_text: Two popular content theories are Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory and Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
ref_text: Maslowen beharren hierarkiaren teoria eta Hertzbergen bi faktoreen teoria dira edukien bi teoria ezagun.
hyp_text: Bi teoria gomendagarriak dira Maslowen beharren piramidea eta Hertzbergek bi faktoreen teoria.

src_text: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

hyp_text: Gaur egun Javako kozina mundu osoan zabaldu da, eta Javaneko sukaldaritza leku askotan aurkitu daiteke. Sukaldaritza honen oinarrizko osagaiak janariak dira, eta Javaneko sukaldaritza zaporetakoak dira, zapore horiek janariak azpizartu eta jangarriak egin dituzte: Javako gaztaz, piper beltzaz, azukrez (esaterako, kokotxaz), eta zenbait zapore aromatiko.
